title: Congratulating Carey High School Head Football Coach Mike Stanley upon the occasion of his designation as New York Jets High School Coach of the Week
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  congratulating  Carey High School Head Football
Coach Mike Stanley upon the occasion of his designation as New York Jets
High School Coach of the Week

WHEREAS, It is incumbent upon the people of the State  of  New  York  to
recognize those individuals within our midst who have contributed great-
ly  to  the quality of our lives by providing exceptional leadership and
commitment to our youth; and
  WHEREAS, It is acknowledged that  athletic  competition  enhances  the
moral  and  physical  development  of  the  young  people of this State,
preparing them for the future by instilling in them the value  of  team-
work,  encouraging  a standard of healthy living, imparting a desire for
success and developing a  sense  of  fair  play  and  competition;  and,
further,  that  excellence  and  success  in  competitive  sports can be
achieved only through strenuous practice, team play and team spirit, all
of which are nurtured by dedicated coaching; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern and in full accord with  its  long-
standing  traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to congratu-
late Carey High School Head Football Coach Mike Stanley upon  the  occa-
sion  of his designation as New York Jets High School Coach of the Week;
and
  WHEREAS, The New York Jets High School Coach  of  the  Week  Award  is
presented each week to a coach in the tri-state area who serves the best
interests  of the game by teaching sound football fundamentals, motivat-
ing young players to achieve and promoting youth football through  dedi-
cation to his community, his school and his student-athletes; and
  WHEREAS,  In  2010,  Head  Football  Coach  Mike Stanley of Carey High
School in Franklin Square, New York, led his team to its first undefeat-
ed regular season since 1978; and
  WHEREAS, Coach Stanley's Seahawks  team  compiled  an  impressive  8-0
regular  season  record and defeated Westbury 42-9 in the first round of
the Nassau County Conference II championships; and
  WHEREAS, A social studies teacher and Dean of Students at  Carey  High
School,  Mike Stanley is finishing his fourth year as varsity head foot-
ball coach; and
  WHEREAS, Mike Stanley's successful coaching techniques are exemplified
by his energy, enthusiasm and passion, which permeates and motivates the
team; he has a passion for the game, a great football mind and a tremen-
dous work ethic; and
  WHEREAS, Mike Stanley is a great communicator who relates well to  all
his players who respond positively to his leadership; now, therefore, be
it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
congratulate Carey High School Head Football Coach Mike Stanley upon the
occasion of his designation as New York Jets High School  Coach  of  the
Week; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted  to Carey High School Head Football Coach Mike Stanley, Franklin
Square, New York.
